If buy 2nd car  ncd starts from 0 for that car. Any ways to circumvent this problem?
yes  don't buy a second car
How to rental co works? Their nth car also start from 0 ncd?
rental companies have special fleet insurance policies. you as private driver will not have access to such schemes  and they are very expensive anyway
Is it? my insurance agent said ncd built from 0 individually even for rental co
bro..you need to explain your question a little clearer. It sounded like you are asking about how rental companies insure their fleets. Now it sounds like you are asking about rental car

individual ncd is per car as far as i know  whether rental or private. this is for individual normal insurance  i dont know how these private hire schemes work. why dont you call up the rental company and ask them since they have the answer
If buy 2nd car  car n insurance under ur name  follow ur existing ncd
Fleet insurance is lump sum against X number of cars.If u have 100 cars  insurance company will quote u based on these 100 cars.Or they can quote u 200 cars and u slowly add to ur fleet
Start from 0 for that car unless transfer ur 1st car ncd to 2nd car
This is true if you do a transfer of the NCD from your first car to 2nd car rite?Anyway he's referring to rental companies not personal buying.
